item.title: Doro Wot
Doro Wot
ዶሮ ወጥ
item.shortDescription: Ethiopian National Dish - spicy chicken stew
የኢትዮጵያ ብሔራዊ ምግብ - ሚጥሚጣ የዶሮ ምግብ
item.longDescription: Traditional Ethiopian chicken stew made with berbere spice, onions, garlic, ginger, and boiled eggs. Served with injera.
Traditionelles äthiopisches Hühnchen-Eintopf mit Berbere-Gewürz, Zwiebeln, Knoblauch, Ingwer und gekochten Eiern. Serviert mit Injera.
ባህላዊ የዶሮ ወጥ ከበርበሬ ቅጠል፣ ሽንኩርት፣ ነጭ ሽንኩርት፣ እንጉዳይ እና የተቀቀሉ እንቁላሎች የተሰራ። ከእንጀራ ጋር ይቀርባል።
